411  bool getBulkStatusInfo(std::vector<int> *servo_ids,
412  std::map<int, std::vector<int32_t> > *responses);
413 
414 
415  /* Bulk Reads the following values in one instruction
416  *
417  * - Present Position
418  * - Present Velocity
419  * - Present Current (or load if MX Series)
420  *
421  * @param servo_ids Pointer to a list of ID's to respond. Dynamixels will respond in order of list index
422  * @param responses Pointer map of dynamixel ID's to dynamixel response vectors, response vectors are a list of
423  * parameter values in the order given above.
424  * @return True on comm success, false otherwise
425  */
426  bool getBulkStateInfo(std::vector<int> *servo_ids,
427  std::map<int, std::vector<int32_t> > *responses);
